thread.title: Win one of three luxury spa days for two
thread.title_full: Win one of three luxury spa days for two - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win one of three luxury spa days for two
text: Solgar is giving three lucky readers the chance to relax and unwind with Temple Spa. Indulge in one of Temple Spaâ€™s signature spa days or curate your own with hand-picked treatments to suit you. Inspired by the Mediterranean, Temple Spa products and professional treatments feature ingredients such as black truffle, champagne, diamonds, essential oils and gold plus feel-good, endorphin-releasing actives, which can make you feel completely restored. For the chance to win one of three luxury spa days, complete the form below by midnight on Sunday 20 September, 2015. Online Form - Win one of three luxury spa days for two
